creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: framed image of a Western couple: woman at R in blue dress with swirling pattern and long headdress; pointing to UR while looking at man to her LL; man is in white pants, black coat, holding walking stick in PR hand and an umbrella over PL shoulder; man's head turned to L away from woman
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Print (ukiyo-e)
